option.name: springBoot
option.value: {"version":{"major":3,"minor":3,"patch":4,"originalText":"3.3.4"},"modules":[{"name":"Developer Tools","values":[{"id":"native","name":"GraalVM Native Support","description":"Support for compiling Spring applications to native executables using the GraalVM native-image compiler.","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.springframework.boot","artifactId":"spring-boot","scope":"compile"},{"id":"dgs-codegen","name":"GraphQL DGS Code Generation","description":"Generate data types and type-safe APIs for querying GraphQL APIs by parsing schema files.","repositories":[],"groupId":"com.netflix.graphql.dgs.codegen","artifactId":"graphql-dgs-codegen-gradle","version":"7.0.3","scope":"compile"},{"id":"devtools","name":"Spring Boot DevTools","description":"Provides fast application restarts, LiveReload, and configurations for enhanced development experience.","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.springframework.boot","artifactId":"spring-boot-devtools","scope":"runtime"},{"id":"lombok","name":"Lombok","description":"Java annotation library which helps to reduce boilerplate code.","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.projectlombok","artifactId":"lombok","scope":"annotationProcessor"},{"id":"configuration-processor","name":"Spring Configuration Processor","description":"Generate metadata for developers to offer contextual help and \"code completion\" when working with custom configuration keys (ex.application.properties/.yml files).","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.springframework.boot","artifactId":"spring-boot-configuration-processor","scope":"annotationProcessor"},{"id":"docker-compose","name":"Docker Compose Support","description":"Provides docker compose support for enhanced development experience.","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.springframework.boot","artifactId":"spring-boot-docker-compose","scope":"runtime"},{"id":"modulith","name":"Spring Modulith","description":"Support for building modular monolithic applications.","versionRange":"[3.3.0,3.6.0-M1)","repositories":[],"bom":{"groupId":"org.springframework.modulith","artifactId":"spring-modulith-bom","version":"1.2.13"},"groupId":"org.springframework.modulith","artifactId":"spring-modulith-starter-core","scope":"compile"}]},{"name":"Web","values":[{"id":"web","name":"Spring Web","description":"Build web, including RESTful, applications using Spring MVC. Uses Apache Tomcat as the default embedded container.","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.springframework.boot","artifactId":"spring-boot-starter-web","scope":"compile"},{"id":"webflux","name":"Spring Reactive Web","description":"Build reactive web applications with Spring WebFlux and Netty.","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.springframework.boot","artifactId":"spring-boot-starter-webflux","scope":"compile"},{"id":"graphql","name":"Spring for GraphQL","description":"Build GraphQL applications with Spring for GraphQL and GraphQL Java.","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.springframework.boot","artifactId":"spring-boot-starter-graphql","scope":"compile"},{"id":"data-rest","name":"Rest Repositories","description":"Exposing Spring Data repositories over REST via Spring Data REST.","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.springframework.boot","artifactId":"spring-boot-starter-data-rest","scope":"compile"},{"id":"session","name":"Spring Session","description":"Provides an API and implementations for managing user session information.","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.springframework.session","artifactId":"spring-session-core","scope":"compile"},{"id":"data-rest-explorer","name":"Rest Repositories HAL Explorer","description":"Browsing Spring Data REST repositories in your browser.","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.springframework.data","artifactId":"spring-data-rest-hal-explorer","scope":"compile"},{"id":"hateoas","name":"Spring HATEOAS","description":"Eases the creation of RESTful APIs that follow the HATEOAS principle when working with Spring / Spring MVC.","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.springframework.boot","artifactId":"spring-boot-starter-hateoas","scope":"compile"},{"id":"web-services","name":"Spring Web Services","description":"Facilitates contract-first SOAP development. Allows for the creation of flexible web services using one of the many ways to manipulate XML payloads.","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.springframework.boot","artifactId":"spring-boot-starter-web-services","scope":"compile"},{"id":"jersey","name":"Jersey","description":"Framework for developing RESTful Web Services in Java that provides support for JAX-RS APIs.","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.springframework.boot","artifactId":"spring-boot-starter-jersey","scope":"compile"},{"id":"netflix-dgs","name":"Netflix DGS","description":"Build GraphQL applications with Netflix DGS and Spring for GraphQL.","versionRange":"[3.3.0,3.6.0-M1)","repositories":[],"bom":{"groupId":"com.netflix.graphql.dgs","artifactId":"graphql-dgs-platform-dependencies","version":"10.1.2"},"groupId":"com.netflix.graphql.dgs","artifactId":"graphql-dgs-spring-graphql-starter","scope":"compile"}]},{"name":"Template Engines","values":[{"id":"thymeleaf","name":"Thymeleaf","description":"A modern server-side Java template engine for both web and standalone environments. Allows HTML to be correctly displayed in browsers and as static prototypes.","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.springframework.boot","artifactId":"spring-boot-starter-thymeleaf","scope":"compile"},{"id":"freemarker","name":"Apache Freemarker","description":"Java library to generate text output (HTML web pages, e-mails, configuration files, source code, etc.) based on templates and changing data.","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.springframework.boot","artifactId":"spring-boot-starter-freemarker","scope":"compile"},{"id":"mustache","name":"Mustache","description":"Logic-less templates for both web and standalone environments. There are no if statements, else clauses, or for loops. Instead there are only tags.","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.springframework.boot","artifactId":"spring-boot-starter-mustache","scope":"compile"},{"id":"groovy-templates","name":"Groovy Templates","description":"Groovy templating engine.","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.springframework.boot","artifactId":"spring-boot-starter-groovy-templates","scope":"compile"},{"id":"jte","name":"JTE","description":"Secure and lightweight template engine for Java and Kotlin.","repositories":[],"groupId":"gg.jte","artifactId":"jte-spring-boot-starter-3","version":"3.1.16","scope":"compile"}]},{"name":"Security","values":[{"id":"security","name":"Spring Security","description":"Highly customizable authentication and access-control framework for Spring applications.","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.springframework.boot","artifactId":"spring-boot-starter-security","scope":"compile"},{"id":"oauth2-client","name":"OAuth2 Client","description":"Spring Boot integration for Spring Security\u0027s OAuth2/OpenID Connect client features.","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.springframework.boot","artifactId":"spring-boot-starter-oauth2-client","scope":"compile"},{"id":"oauth2-authorization-server","name":"OAuth2 Authorization Server","description":"Spring Boot integration for Spring Authorization Server.","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.springframework.boot","artifactId":"spring-boot-starter-oauth2-authorization-server","scope":"compile"},{"id":"oauth2-resource-server","name":"OAuth2 Resource Server","description":"Spring Boot integration for Spring Security\u0027s OAuth2 resource server features.","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.springframework.boot","artifactId":"spring-boot-starter-oauth2-resource-server","scope":"compile"},{"id":"data-ldap","name":"Spring LDAP","description":"Makes it easier to build Spring based applications that use the Lightweight Directory Access Protocol.","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.springframework.boot","artifactId":"spring-boot-starter-data-ldap","scope":"compile"},{"id":"okta","name":"Okta","description":"Okta specific configuration for Spring Security/Spring Boot OAuth2 features. Enable your Spring Boot application to work with Okta via OAuth 2.0/OIDC.","versionRange":"[3.3.0,3.4.0-M1)","repositories":[],"groupId":"com.okta.spring","artifactId":"okta-spring-boot-starter","version":"3.0.7","scope":"compile"}]},{"name":"SQL","values":[{"id":"jdbc","name":"JDBC API","description":"Database Connectivity API that defines how a client may connect and query a database.","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.springframework.boot","artifactId":"spring-boot-starter-jdbc","scope":"compile"},{"id":"data-jpa","name":"Spring Data JPA","description":"Persist data in SQL stores with Java Persistence API using Spring Data and Hibernate.","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.springframework.boot","artifactId":"spring-boot-starter-data-jpa","scope":"compile"},{"id":"data-jdbc","name":"Spring Data JDBC","description":"Persist data in SQL stores with plain JDBC using Spring Data.","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.springframework.boot","artifactId":"spring-boot-starter-data-jdbc","scope":"compile"},{"id":"data-r2dbc","name":"Spring Data R2DBC","description":"Provides Reactive Relational Database Connectivity to persist data in SQL stores using Spring Data in reactive applications.","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.springframework.boot","artifactId":"spring-boot-starter-data-r2dbc","scope":"compile"},{"id":"mybatis","name":"MyBatis Framework","description":"Persistence framework with support for custom SQL, stored procedures and advanced mappings. MyBatis couples objects with stored procedures or SQL statements using a XML descriptor or annotations.","versionRange":"[3.3.0,3.5.0-M1)","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.mybatis.spring.boot","artifactId":"mybatis-spring-boot-starter","version":"3.0.4","scope":"compile"},{"id":"liquibase","name":"Liquibase Migration","description":"Liquibase database migration and source control library.","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.liquibase","artifactId":"liquibase-core","scope":"compile"},{"id":"flyway","name":"Flyway Migration","description":"Version control for your database so you can migrate from any version (incl. an empty database) to the latest version of the schema.","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.flywaydb","artifactId":"flyway-core","scope":"compile"},{"id":"jooq","name":"JOOQ Access Layer","description":"Generate Java code from your database and build type safe SQL queries through a fluent API.","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.springframework.boot","artifactId":"spring-boot-starter-jooq","scope":"compile"},{"id":"db2","name":"IBM DB2 Driver","description":"A JDBC driver that provides access to IBM DB2.","repositories":[],"groupId":"com.ibm.db2","artifactId":"jcc","scope":"runtime"},{"id":"derby","name":"Apache Derby Database","description":"An open source relational database implemented entirely in Java.","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.apache.derby","artifactId":"derby","scope":"runtime"},{"id":"h2","name":"H2 Database","description":"Provides a fast in-memory database that supports JDBC API and R2DBC access, with a small (2mb) footprint. Supports embedded and server modes as well as a browser based console application.","repositories":[],"groupId":"com.h2database","artifactId":"h2","scope":"runtime"},{"id":"hsql","name":"HyperSQL Database","description":"Lightweight 100% Java SQL Database Engine.","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.hsqldb","artifactId":"hsqldb","scope":"runtime"},{"id":"mariadb","name":"MariaDB Driver","description":"MariaDB JDBC and R2DBC driver.","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.mariadb.jdbc","artifactId":"mariadb-java-client","scope":"runtime"},{"id":"sqlserver","name":"MS SQL Server Driver","description":"A JDBC and R2DBC driver that provides access to Microsoft SQL Server and Azure SQL Database from any Java application.","repositories":[],"groupId":"com.microsoft.sqlserver","artifactId":"mssql-jdbc","scope":"runtime"},{"id":"mysql","name":"MySQL Driver","description":"MySQL JDBC driver.","repositories":[],"groupId":"com.mysql","artifactId":"mysql-connector-j","scope":"runtime"},{"id":"oracle","name":"Oracle Driver","description":"A JDBC driver that provides access to Oracle.","repositories":[],"groupId":"com.oracle.database.jdbc","artifactId":"ojdbc11","scope":"runtime"},{"id":"postgresql","name":"PostgreSQL Driver","description":"A JDBC and R2DBC driver that allows Java programs to connect to a PostgreSQL database using standard, database independent Java code.","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.postgresql","artifactId":"postgresql","scope":"runtime"}]},{"name":"NoSQL","values":[{"id":"data-redis","name":"Spring Data Redis (Access+Driver)","description":"Advanced and thread-safe Java Redis client for synchronous, asynchronous, and reactive usage. Supports Cluster, Sentinel, Pipelining, Auto-Reconnect, Codecs and much more.","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.springframework.boot","artifactId":"spring-boot-starter-data-redis","scope":"compile"},{"id":"data-redis-reactive","name":"Spring Data Reactive Redis","description":"Access Redis key-value data stores in a reactive fashion with Spring Data Redis.","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.springframework.boot","artifactId":"spring-boot-starter-data-redis-reactive","scope":"compile"},{"id":"data-mongodb","name":"Spring Data MongoDB","description":"Store data in flexible, JSON-like documents, meaning fields can vary from document to document and data structure can be changed over time.","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.springframework.boot","artifactId":"spring-boot-starter-data-mongodb","scope":"compile"},{"id":"data-mongodb-reactive","name":"Spring Data Reactive MongoDB","description":"Provides asynchronous stream processing with non-blocking back pressure for MongoDB.","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.springframework.boot","artifactId":"spring-boot-starter-data-mongodb-reactive","scope":"compile"},{"id":"data-elasticsearch","name":"Spring Data Elasticsearch (Access+Driver)","description":"A distributed, RESTful search and analytics engine with Spring Data Elasticsearch.","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.springframework.boot","artifactId":"spring-boot-starter-data-elasticsearch","scope":"compile"},{"id":"data-cassandra","name":"Spring Data for Apache Cassandra","description":"A free and open-source, distributed, NoSQL database management system that offers high-scalability and high-performance.","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.springframework.boot","artifactId":"spring-boot-starter-data-cassandra","scope":"compile"},{"id":"data-cassandra-reactive","name":"Spring Data Reactive for Apache Cassandra","description":"Access Cassandra NoSQL Database in a reactive fashion.","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.springframework.boot","artifactId":"spring-boot-starter-data-cassandra-reactive","scope":"compile"},{"id":"data-couchbase","name":"Spring Data Couchbase","description":"NoSQL document-oriented database that offers in memory-first architecture, geo-distributed deployments, and workload isolation.","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.springframework.boot","artifactId":"spring-boot-starter-data-couchbase","scope":"compile"},{"id":"data-couchbase-reactive","name":"Spring Data Reactive Couchbase","description":"Access Couchbase NoSQL database in a reactive fashion with Spring Data Couchbase.","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.springframework.boot","artifactId":"spring-boot-starter-data-couchbase-reactive","scope":"compile"},{"id":"data-neo4j","name":"Spring Data Neo4j","description":"An open source NoSQL database that stores data structured as graphs consisting of nodes, connected by relationships.","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.springframework.boot","artifactId":"spring-boot-starter-data-neo4j","scope":"compile"}]},{"name":"Messaging","values":[{"id":"integration","name":"Spring Integration","description":"Adds support for Enterprise Integration Patterns. Enables lightweight messaging and supports integration with external systems via declarative adapters.","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.springframework.boot","artifactId":"spring-boot-starter-integration","scope":"compile"},{"id":"amqp","name":"Spring for RabbitMQ","description":"Gives your received.","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.springframework.boot","artifactId":"spring-boot-starter-amqp","scope":"compile"},{"id":"amqp-streams","name":"Spring for RabbitMQ subscribe, store, and process streams of records.","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.springframework.kafka","artifactId":"spring-kafka","scope":"compile"},{"id":"kafka-streams","name":"Spring for Apache Kafka Streams","description":"Building stream processing applications with Apache Kafka Streams.","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.apache.kafka","artifactId":"kafka-streams","scope":"compile"},{"id":"activemq","name":"Spring for Apache ActiveMQ 5","description":"Spring JMS support with Camel","description":"Apache Camel is an open source integration framework that empowers you to quickly and easily integrate various systems consuming or producing with Hibernate validator.","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.springframework.boot","artifactId":"spring-boot-starter-validation","scope":"compile"},{"id":"mail","name":"Java Mail Sender","description":"Send email using Java Mail and Spring Framework\u0027s using Quartz.","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.springframework.boot","artifactId":"spring-boot-starter-quartz","scope":"compile"},{"id":"cache","name":"Spring Cache Abstraction","description":"Provides cache-related operations, such as the ability to update the content of the cache, but does not provide the actual data store.","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.springframework.boot","artifactId":"spring-boot-starter-cache","scope":"compile"},{"id":"spring-shell","name":"Spring Shell","description":"Build command line applications with spring.","versionRange":"[3.3.0,3.5.0-M1)","repositories":[],"bom":{"groupId":"org.springframework.shell","artifactId":"spring-shell-dependencies","version":"3.4.0"},"groupId":"org.springframework.shell","artifactId":"spring-shell-starter","scope":"compile"}]},{"name":"Ops","values":[{"id":"actuator","name":"Spring Boot Actuator","description":"Supports built in (or custom) endpoints that let you monitor and manage your application - such as application health, metrics, sessions, etc.","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.springframework.boot","artifactId":"spring-boot-starter-actuator","scope":"compile"},{"id":"sbom-cyclone-dx","name":"CycloneDX SBOM support","description":"Creates a Software Bill of Materials in CycloneDX Spring Boot Admin (Server)","description":"A community project to manage and monitor your Spring Boot applications. Provides a UI on top of the Spring Boot Actuator endpoints.","versionRange":"[3.3.0,3.6.0-M1)","repositories":[],"bom":{"groupId":"de.codecentric","artifactId":"spring-boot-admin-dependencies","version":"3.3.6"},"groupId":"de.codecentric","artifactId":"spring-boot-admin-starter-server","scope":"compile"},{"id":"sentry","name":"Sentry","description":"Application performance monitoring and error tracking that help software teams see clearer, solve quicker, and learn continuously.","versionRange":"[3.3.0,3.6.0-M1)","repositories":[],"bom":{"groupId":"io.sentry","artifactId":"sentry-bom","version":"8.13.2"},"groupId":"io.sentry","artifactId":"sentry-spring-boot-starter-jakarta","scope":"compile"}]},{"name":"Observability","values":[{"id":"datadog","name":"Datadog","description":"Publish Micrometer metrics to Datadog, a dimensional time-series SaaS with built-in dashboarding and alerting.","repositories":[],"groupId":"io.micrometer","artifactId":"micrometer-registry-datadog","scope":"runtime"},{"id":"dynatrace","name":"Dynatrace","description":"Publish Micrometer metrics to Dynatrace, a platform featuring observability, AIOps, application security and analytics.","repositories":[],"groupId":"io.micrometer","artifactId":"micrometer-registry-dynatrace","scope":"runtime"},{"id":"influx","name":"Influx","description":"Publish Micrometer metrics to InfluxDB, a dimensional time-series server that support real-time stream processing of data.","repositories":[],"groupId":"io.micrometer","artifactId":"micrometer-registry-influx","scope":"runtime"},{"id":"graphite","name":"Graphite","description":"Publish Micrometer metrics to Graphite, a hierarchical metrics system backed by a fixed-size database.","repositories":[],"groupId":"io.micrometer","artifactId":"micrometer-registry-graphite","scope":"runtime"},{"id":"new-relic","name":"New Relic","description":"Publish Micrometer metrics to New Relic, a SaaS offering with a full UI and a query language called NRQL.","repositories":[],"groupId":"io.micrometer","artifactId":"micrometer-registry-new-relic","scope":"runtime"},{"id":"otlp-metrics","name":"OTLP for metrics","description":"Publish Micrometer metrics to an OpenTelemetry Protocol (OTLP) capable backend.","repositories":[],"groupId":"io.micrometer","artifactId":"micrometer-registry-otlp","scope":"runtime"},{"id":"prometheus","name":"Prometheus","description":"Expose Micrometer metrics in Prometheus format, an in-memory dimensional time series database with a simple built-in UI, a custom query language, and math operations.","repositories":[],"groupId":"io.micrometer","artifactId":"micrometer-registry-prometheus","scope":"runtime"},{"id":"distributed-tracing","name":"Distributed Tracing","description":"Enable span and trace IDs in logs.","repositories":[],"groupId":"io.micrometer","artifactId":"micrometer-tracing-bridge-brave","scope":"compile"},{"id":"wavefront","name":"Wavefront","description":"Publish metrics and optionally distributed traces to Tanzu Observability by Wavefront, a SaaS-based metrics monitoring and analytics platform that lets you visualize, query, and alert over data from across your entire stack.","versionRange":"[3.3.0,3.6.0-M1)","repositories":[],"groupId":"io.micrometer","artifactId":"micrometer-registry-wavefront","scope":"compile"},{"id":"zipkin","name":"Zipkin","description":"Enable and expose span and trace IDs to Zipkin.","repositories":[],"groupId":"io.zipkin.reporter2","artifactId":"zipkin-reporter-brave","scope":"compile"}]},{"name":"Testing","values":[{"id":"restdocs","name":"Spring REST Docs","description":"Document RESTful services by combining hand-written with Asciidoctor and auto-generated snippets produced with Spring MVC Test.","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.springframework.restdocs","artifactId":"spring-restdocs-mockmvc","scope":"test"},{"id":"testcontainers","name":"Testcontainers","description":"Provide lightweight, throwaway instances of common databases, Selenium web browsers, or anything else that can run in a Docker level of software architecture by enabling Consumer Driven Contract (CDC) development.","versionRange":"[3.3.0,3.6.0-M1)","repositories":[],"bom":{"groupId":"org.springframework.cloud","artifactId":"spring-cloud-dependencies","version":"2023.0.5"},"groupId":"org.springframework.cloud","artifactId":"spring-cloud-starter-contract-verifier","scope":"test"},{"id":"cloud-contract-stub-runner","name":"Contract Stub Runner","description":"Stub Runner for HTTP/Messaging based communication. Allows creating WireMock stubs from RestDocs tests.","versionRange":"[3.3.0,3.6.0-M1)","repositories":[],"bom":{"groupId":"org.springframework.cloud","artifactId":"spring-cloud-dependencies","version":"2023.0.5"},"groupId":"org.springframework.cloud","artifactId":"spring-cloud-starter-contract-stub-runner","scope":"test"},{"id":"unboundid-ldap","name":"Embedded LDAP Server","description":"Provides a platform neutral way for running a LDAP server in unit tests.","repositories":[],"groupId":"com.unboundid","artifactId":"unboundid-ldapsdk","scope":"test"}]},{"name":"Spring Cloud","values":[{"id":"cloud-starter","name":"Cloud Bootstrap","description":"Non-specific Spring Cloud features, unrelated to external libraries or integrations (e.g. Bootstrap context and @RefreshScope).","versionRange":"[3.3.0,3.6.0-M1)","repositories":[],"bom":{"groupId":"org.springframework.cloud","artifactId":"spring-cloud-dependencies","version":"2023.0.5"},"groupId":"org.springframework.cloud","artifactId":"spring-cloud-starter","scope":"compile"},{"id":"cloud-function","name":"Function","description":"Promotes the implementation of business logic via functions and supports a uniform programming model across serverless providers, as well as the ability to run standalone (locally or in a PaaS).","versionRange":"[3.3.0,3.6.0-M1)","repositories":[],"bom":{"groupId":"org.springframework.cloud","artifactId":"spring-cloud-dependencies","version":"2023.0.5"},"groupId":"org.springframework.cloud","artifactId":"spring-cloud-function-context","scope":"compile"},{"id":"cloud-task","name":"Task","description":"Allows a user to develop and run short lived microservices using Spring Cloud. Run them locally, in the cloud, and on Spring Cloud Data Flow.","versionRange":"[3.3.0,3.6.0-M1)","repositories":[],"bom":{"groupId":"org.springframework.cloud","artifactId":"spring-cloud-dependencies","version":"2023.0.5"},"groupId":"org.springframework.cloud","artifactId":"spring-cloud-starter-task","scope":"compile"}]},{"name":"Spring Cloud Config","values":[{"id":"cloud-config-client","name":"Config Client","description":"Client that connects to a Spring Cloud Config Server to fetch the application\u0027s configuration.","versionRange":"[3.3.0,3.6.0-M1)","repositories":[],"bom":{"groupId":"org.springframework.cloud","artifactId":"spring-cloud-dependencies","version":"2023.0.5"},"groupId":"org.springframework.cloud","artifactId":"spring-cloud-starter-config","scope":"compile"},{"id":"cloud-config-server","name":"Config Server","description":"Central management for configuration via Git, SVN, or HashiCorp Vault.","versionRange":"[3.3.0,3.6.0-M1)","repositories":[],"bom":{"groupId":"org.springframework.cloud","artifactId":"spring-cloud-dependencies","version":"2023.0.5"},"groupId":"org.springframework.cloud","artifactId":"spring-cloud-config-server","scope":"compile"},{"id":"cloud-starter-vault-config","name":"Vault Configuration","description":"Provides client-side support for externalized configuration in a distributed system. Using HashiCorp\u0027s Vault you have a central place to manage external secret properties for applications across all environments.","versionRange":"[3.3.0,3.6.0-M1)","repositories":[],"bom":{"groupId":"org.springframework.cloud","artifactId":"spring-cloud-dependencies","version":"2023.0.5"},"groupId":"org.springframework.cloud","artifactId":"spring-cloud-starter-vault-config","scope":"compile"},{"id":"cloud-starter-zookeeper-config","name":"Apache Zookeeper Configuration","description":"Enable and configure common patterns inside your application and build large distributed systems with Apache Zookeeper based components. The provided patterns include Service Discovery and Configuration.","versionRange":"[3.3.0,3.6.0-M1)","repositories":[],"bom":{"groupId":"org.springframework.cloud","artifactId":"spring-cloud-dependencies","version":"2023.0.5"},"groupId":"org.springframework.cloud","artifactId":"spring-cloud-starter-zookeeper-config","scope":"compile"},{"id":"cloud-starter-consul-config","name":"Consul Configuration","description":"Enable and configure the common patterns inside your application and build large distributed systems with Hashicorpâ€™s Consul. The patterns provided include Service Discovery, Distributed Configuration and Control
